body_html:
@martinwicke I've explicitely asked for 1.9 as soon as @ewilderj announced the cut out on the google group. See #17950 (comment)

Google is heavly involved in Kubernetes and there it can handle labels without problems.
So handling labels in kubernetes style or start to use https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/projects it is a good minimum starting point.

Have you an internal ETA? Cause @ewilderj already annunced the 1.10 cut out date.

body:
@martinwicke I've explicitely asked for 1.9 as soon as @ewilderj announced the cut out on the google group. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17950#issuecomment-391318178

Google is heavly involved in Kubernetes and there it can handle labels without problems. 
So handling labels in kubernetes style or start to use https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/projects it is a good minimum starting point.

Have you an internal ETA? Cause @ewilderj already annunced the 1.10 cut out date.
